Patrick: Tax plan proposal fair; rates to go up for most

science in mind blog

Scientists show genetic privacy of research participants is at risk online

A team of Cambridge scientists reported Thursday that genetic information, much like credit cards and bank accounts, can be hacked using the Internet. (Globe)

Under the name of Abigail Van Buren, Pauline Friedman Phillips wrote the long-running "Dear Abby" advice column that was followed by millions of newspaper readers globally. (AP)
